summary: 7 Spanish top corporate job candidates are left in a room and informed on computer screens about their tasks and that one of them is an observer. Let the psyching begin.
cast: Eduardo Noriega|Najwa Nimri|Eduard Fernández|Pablo Echarri|Ernesto Alterio|Carmelo Gómez|Adriana Ozores|Natalia Verbeke
title: El método
